title: Kindred Should Have Regional Runeterran Skins
body:
In a lot of real life cultures, mythology, creation stories, or "embodiments" of death and the afterlife are similar but different regions have different ideas of what they look like.


So i think kindred should have skins based on what runeterrans think she looks like according to their homelands.

What combos do you folks think would work for which regions?

When I said "actions"I mean't Riots overall actions.
I mean Riot has for a while appealed mostly to the majority - hence all the skins for Ez, Lux, Ahri, MF. Champs getting buffed before a skin release is never a coincidence.

> Riot has for a while appealed mostly to China  - hence all the skins for Ez, Lux, Ahri, MF. 

Sadly. 

> Champs getting buffed before a skin release is never a coincidence.

Lucian got a skin in 9.12; Buffed in 9.15 (Over a month later, a small buff to his very late-game/solo lane) 
Prior to that in ... 9.4 he got a minor nerf and has otherwise been absent from patch notes for all of 2019. 

Garen got major changes in 9.20, more aimed at bringing his viability in high elo up than anything else (Garen+yuumi bot appeared coincidentally at the same time as these changes, but I doubt theyre connected. The scope is too large to have concocted so suddenly, and does not address the synergy with Yuumi in bot lane.) 
He's gotten a few skins, but fewer patches; One of his biggest most recent changes prior to the current patch was just a reverted buff. 
And that was 8.9 - Well over two months before his Legendary skin would be released. 

These are just random examples. 
Riot makes a lot of changes to certain champions, or makes changes to random champions multiple times a month. 
They also make a lot of skins at a constant cadence. Sometimes these overlap, and confirmation bias convinces people theyre related. 
They aren't. I doubt the balance team has any idea what skins are coming out at all.

I support Kindred getting a skin, if it happens but highly unlikely  mostly popular champions getting skins.  but can't complain I guess cause I stopped caring about champions like Xerath or Taliyah that been without a skin for while ( As I do not count Taliyahs SSG Skin as its only available during MSI or Worlds)
As a Kindred main, I support any and all things associated with buffs and skins for this long-forgotten champion.

I honestly think that in order for Kindred to become meta-and honestly more importantly, more popular- their kit needs to be made a bit more interesting,

I'm was a kindred main and have about 200thousand + ish points on kindred, and I absolutely love their stoic and intense, beautiful theme. I don't know if animals are necessarily the best way to reimagine their theme, as that's sort of separate from what their identity is, i.e. 'they're not a mainly hunter and prey, this is just used to symbolize two sides of death".

Anyways, regardless of the skins that are released- which I'm honestly desperate for as they haven't had skin in over 2 years and their existing skins are not improvements on their base- I think the interaction between kindreds' w and q needs to be made more complex, interactive, and able to express higher skill ceiling. The most skill expression on kindred possible right now, beyond efficient clearing and counter jungle-ing ( which are also skills on basically every other JG champ, :3), is really just ult timing and knowing how to outplay people (rarely) by jumping over small walls during fights. That does not feel very satisfying for the players like me who would play the champion a lot and want to be rewarded with consistently better and more finessed use of their abilities. 

Just to reiterate, I would love to see a kindred skin desperately, but I think their kit needs to be improved, complexified, and honestly modernized to be in line with the standard and complexity of riots recent releases.

Best wishes, and prayers for a skin lol,
